Sublime Text

Summary

Programmer’s text editor extensible in Python

Interesting Sublime Text Plugins

NeoVintageous

Neovintageous seems like the freshest Vim emulation mode for Sublime Text

GitHub - NeoVintageous/NeoVintageous

NeoVintageous Docs

Org Extended

GitHub - ihdavids/orgextended

Org Extended is a rough but very usable Org Mode for Sublime Text; the fact that it’s implemented in Python has my curiosity up too.

Origami

GitHub - SublimeText/Origami

Manage Sublime Text editor panes
